## Exercise 1

Take a look at the code below. What would be the results of the computation? Write down your answer **before** running the code chunk!
**Answer:**

```{r exercise 01}
x <- c(1, 3, 5)
y <- c(2, 4, 2)
z <- c(3, 4, 1)

x * y + z
```
